summary: The Pacific Northwest is prone to earthquakes and tsunamis. But only 19 of the 39 Coast Guard units at risk in this region have a written tsunami evacuation plan for personnel and their dependents. The Coast Guard requires units to create written tsunami evacuation plans but doesn't ensure that they do. Also, there's no guidance for developing the plans—resulting in wide variations in their content...
title: Coast Guard: Additional Actions Needed to Improve Tsunami Emergency Planning in the Pacific Northwest
